short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes a lot of the screenreader unfriendly portions of Genius.com's song lyrics pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension strips out some of the screen-reader unfriendly portion of the individual song lyrics pages for Genius.com
